name: Anselm Blumer
content: Anselm Blumer, Computer Science, Tufts University Anselm Blumer Assoc. Prof. Emeritus Anselm Blumer Phone: (617) 627-3651 Computer Science Dept: (617) 627-2225 Tufts University FAX: (617) 627-2227 Medford MA 02155 Email: ablumer (at) cs dot tufts dot edu As of March 1, 2018 I am "Emeritus", a term from the Latin "e or ex" (out of) + "mereri" (earn), so perhaps it means "out of money". Slides for PAC Learning and Parameterized Complexity, 20 November, 2024: Slides Slides for tutorial on classical and quantum data compression, 23 July and 6 August, 2024: Slides Slides for Quantum Logic discussion, 4 April, 2024: Slides Lecture on data science and computer science, 28 April, 2023: Slides Lecture on some data compression algorithms, 12 March, 2020: Slides Lecture on Burrows-Wheeler transform, 9 March, 2020: Slides Lecture on Dirichlet-Discrete model, 29 January, 2020: Slides Lecture on matroids, 31 October, 2019: Slides and handout Second lecture on matroids, 21 November, 2019: Slides and handout In Fall 2017, I taught COMP 160: Analysis of Algorithms In Fall 2016, I taught COMP 150MDC: Multimedia Data Compression and COMP 165: Cryptography In Fall 2015, I
